MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 16-NOV-2020 20:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the CW9 postcode area of Northwich, affecting properties in Adlington Drive, Bollington Avenue, Fairfield Road, Old Hall Road and surrounding streets. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further investigations required to locate and repair the fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.07PM on 16th November 2020.
